channel.title: Larps on Econauts LARP

item.title: The Sharing
item.description: The Sharing is a sci-fi secrets-and-powers LARP set in the world of K.A. Applegate’s Animorphs. This is a game of secrecy and paranoia, where you can never be sure who to trust and who has an evil mind-controlling slug lurking behind their friendly grin.
